whole_object: This pizza's so big, it's basically a "cheese wheel" of Fortune!
single_object:
- Pizza: This pizza is so good, even the toppings have a-meating about it every Friday night.
- Plate: The plate whispered quietly, "Self-control is overrated; go ahead, take another slice."
- Fork: The fork always considered itself the ultimate 'piercer' of truths in the cutlery drawer.
- Knife: The knife's favorite magic trick was performing a slice of hand.
- Glass: The glass, half full with optimism, always looked on the bright cider life.
- Napkin: The napkin is the only thing at the table that truly understands mess-takes.
- Salt shaker: The salt shaker goes through life shaking things up by just a grain.
- Pepper shaker: The pepper shaker always wanted to be a seasoned traveler.
- Cheese shaker: The cheese shaker said to the pasta, "You've got to brie kidding me, we make the grate-est team!" 
- Juice: The juice couldn't concentrate, thinking about the pulp fiction it was steeped in.
multi_object:
- Pizza  
- Plate  
- "This pizza is so cheesy, it could give a plate a run for its money in a beauty contest!"  

- Plate  
- Fork  
- "This plate is feeling a bit forked up, trying to hold all this deliciousness!"  

- Fork  
- Knife  
- "I told the fork to cut it out, but it just couldn't resist the knife's sharp wit!"  

- Knife  
- Napkin  
- "This knife is so sharp, it could slice through a napkin's excuses for not being more absorbent!"  

- Glass  
- Juice  
- "This glass is feeling a bit juiced up, ready to spill the tea on all the pizza drama!"  

- Napkin  
- Salt shaker  
- "This napkin is ready to catch all the saltiness from the pizza's spicy gossip!"  

- Salt shaker  
- Pepper shaker  
- "The salt shaker and pepper shaker are having a seasoning showdown—who will spice things up more?"  

- Pepper shaker  
- Cheese shaker  
- "The pepper shaker thinks it's the life of the party, but the cheese shaker knows it's the real flavor MVP!"  

- Cheese shaker  
- Juice  
- "This cheese shaker is feeling a bit saucy, trying to outshine the juice at the table!"  

- Juice  
- Pizza  
- "This juice is trying to squeeze into the pizza party, but it knows it can't ketchup with all that cheese!"
